name: Earnsured Asset Management
description:
EARNSURED ASSET MANAGEMENT is an Independent Investment Management Firm with a diversified range of strategies geared towards enriching our clientele of private and institutional investors.

With over $300 million Asset Under Management, our investments mix consists of; Stocks, Bonds, ETF's, Forex trading, Crypto assets, and Real Estate Investment Trusts (REIT).

We run a global investment platform using a decentralized financing (DeFi) strategy powered by blockchain technology. This allows us to fund and manage investments across the globe. This explains why we are able to efficiently fund and manage assets in countries across the world with major strongholds.

We leverage Cryptocurrency, latest developments in technology and the experience of our founding general partners to ensure that we keep our promise that our clients can never lose money. Our huge financial reserves in excess of $20 million dollars ensures that we pay our clients the profits we promised them even when an "Act of God" prevents us from being profitable in our investment of client funds which of course has never happened before.

Our client investments are also protected by the Securities Investors Protection Corporation (SIPC), hence providing an extra layer of security to our investor's funds

team.name: Edric Simmonds
team.bioHtml: Portfolio Manager at Earnsured Asset Management

jobs.title: Growth Marketing/ Community  (Remote - India)
jobs.description:
**Please note, all positions at Earnsured require relevant experience. Applications without required experience will not be considered.**

EARNSURED ASSET MANAGEMENT is an Independent Investment Management Firm with a diversified range of strategies geared towards enriching our clientele of private and institutional investors.

With over $300 million Asset Under Management, our investments mix consists of; Stocks, Bonds, ETF's, Forex trading, Crypto assets, and Real Estate Investment Trusts (REIT).


Community Managers will be representing Earnsured in  and must be very knowledgeable about our services and the cryptocurrency industry in general in order to best support and create content for our communities with accuracy and passion.

The ideal Community Manager has exceptional oral and written communication skills. They have the ability to develop engaging and unique content. You should be a ‘people person’ with great customer service skills. You should also possess the ability to moderate community conversations, both online and offline.

Ultimately, you will act as the face and voice of our brand and the management of all community communication.

This will be utilitising a variety of marketing strategies including but not limited to social media outreach, building our network of effective affiliate management.

**Responsibilities:**
Planning and execution of online and some offline marketing activities, events, and campaigns to local audiences.

Grow our user base and increase awareness of the Earnsured brand in fun, creative and informative ways.

Build on relationship with online influencers and increase our advocacy networks

Attract and manage affiliates relationships - improve incentivisation strategies

Explore new community friendly platforms to facilitate the expansion of Binance local userbase and influence.

Assist in organizing online and offline events and meet-ups

Post content across Local social media

Engage the community through contests, webinars, etc.

Making calls to potential new clients

Closing new managed accounts

Meeting clients face to face/video

Acquiring and developing trust relationships with a portfolio of major clients (global institutional clients)

Expanding and managing the relationships with existing clients through good communication and good understanding of their needs

Championing institutional clients product development

Help with translations and proofread contents

Strategise and manage trading competitions that inspire users to join and use our platform

Innovate new ways to increase brand awareness and keep up to date on modern marketing trends.

**Requirements:**

 Experience building and moderating a community
 Demonstrated background/interest in cryptocurrency and trading
 Strong writing skills

Strong understanding and enthusiasm for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies Genuine enthusiasm for social and community engagement Excellent copywriting skills, with the ability to educate and entertain through text A creative eye, and experience working with talented designers Demonstrable experience growing social media accounts, preferably in the cryptocurrency or fintech sectors Marketing, economics, or business graduate, with at least two years of relevant experience since your bachelor’s degree Understanding of the business impact of well crafted social media

Have good relations with other Telegram group/channels

Proven experience in growing and managing user base

Must have a strong interest and knowledge in the crypto/blockchain/technology space

Must be able to work independently.

Social media experience (Telegram/Twitter/Bitcointalk/Reddit)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Please note, all positions at Earnsured require relevant experience. Applications without required experience will not be considered.

EARNSURED ASSET MANAGEMENT is an Independent Investment Management Firm with a diversified range of strategies geared towards enriching our clientele of private and institutional investors.

With over $300 million Asset Under Management, our investments mix consists of; Stocks, Bonds, ETF's, Forex trading, Crypto assets, and Real Estate Investment Trusts (REIT).

Community Managers will be representing Earnsured in and must be very knowledgeable about our services and the cryptocurrency industry in general in order to best support and create content for our communities with accuracy and passion.

The ideal Community Manager has exceptional oral and written communication skills. They have the ability to develop engaging and unique content. You should be a ‘people person’ with great customer service skills. You should also possess the ability to moderate community conversations, both online and offline.

Ultimately, you will act as the face and voice of our brand and the management of all community communication.

This will be utilitising a variety of marketing strategies including but not limited to social media outreach, building our network of effective affiliate management.

Responsibilities:
Planning and execution of online and some offline marketing activities, events, and campaigns to local audiences.

Grow our user base and increase awareness of the Earnsured brand in fun, creative and informative ways.

Build on relationship with online influencers and increase our advocacy networks

Attract and manage affiliates relationships - improve incentivisation strategies

Explore new community friendly platforms to facilitate the expansion of Binance local userbase and influence.

Assist in organizing online and offline events and meet-ups

Post content across Local social media

Engage the community through contests, webinars, etc.

Making calls to potential new clients

Closing new managed accounts

Meeting clients face to face/video

Acquiring and developing trust relationships with a portfolio of major clients (global institutional clients)

Expanding and managing the relationships with existing clients through good communication and good understanding of their needs

Championing institutional clients product development

Help with translations and proofread contents

Strategise and manage trading competitions that inspire users to join and use our platform

Innovate new ways to increase brand awareness and keep up to date on modern marketing trends.

Requirements:

Experience building and moderating a community
Demonstrated background/interest in cryptocurrency and trading
Strong writing skills

Strong understanding and enthusiasm for Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies Genuine enthusiasm for social and community engagement Excellent copywriting skills, with the ability to educate and entertain through text A creative eye, and experience working with talented designers Demonstrable experience growing social media accounts, preferably in the cryptocurrency or fintech sectors Marketing, economics, or business graduate, with at least two years of relevant experience since your bachelor’s degree Understanding of the business impact of well crafted social media

Have good relations with other Telegram group/channels

Proven experience in growing and managing user base

Must have a strong interest and knowledge in the crypto/blockchain/technology space

Must be able to work independently.

Social media experience (Telegram/Twitter/Bitcointalk/Reddit)
